candidates.why: Exact oracle command: same perspectives model, discovery artifacts, optional external research, and export-to-issues flow.
Same command family (issue discovery), similar multi-round orchestration (AskUserQuestion + Task), and uses external research tooling patterns.
Same issue workflow lifecycle and post-discovery next-step; demonstrates orchestrator patterns and safe handling of large issue stores.
Shows issue JSONL schema expectations and minimal clarification patterns (auto-mode vs interactive).
Demonstrates converting artifacts into issue workflow outputs and safe file IO patterns under .workflow/issues/.

selected.why: Use the exact oracle as the primary reference for required headings, artifacts, and orchestration steps.
